about_the_game:
NotificationCat VR is a mobile phone message notification sync Utility for SteamVR

This Utility allows you to forward notification messages from Android or iOS devices to VR while you are playing VR games. Display notification messages such as notification titles, contents, etc. without taking off your VR headset.

Features


  • Show your phone notifications in SteamVR : Worried about missing phone notifications while playing VR? Want to check notifications but don't want to take off the VR Headset? NotificationCat VR solves this problem for you ！

  • Supports Android and iOS devices: You may have used other similar VR notification forwarding software, but we are support iOS Device (iPhone Only) .

  • Android App : We also made an APP for Android, which will make using it faster and more convenient!

  • Long-term updates : NotificationCat VR has a long-term update plan We not only add new features during the software's lifecycle, but also respond to user feedback, including adopting new feature suggestions and fixing bugs!

  • Complete user manual and online developer support : Our user manual and error handling manual have both website and offline pdf versions, and You can ask for help from the developers via email, Steam or any other form

Having trouble using the Utility ?


If you have any issues with the application or find other compatibility issues, don't hesitate to contact us! We'll whip up a hotfix ASAP!
detailed_description:
NotificationCat VR is a mobile phone message notification sync Utility for SteamVR

This Utility allows you to forward notification messages from Android or iOS devices to VR while you are playing VR games. Display notification messages such as notification titles, contents, etc. without taking off your VR headset.

Features


  • Show your phone notifications in SteamVR : Worried about missing phone notifications while playing VR? Want to check notifications but don't want to take off the VR Headset? NotificationCat VR solves this problem for you ！

  • Supports Android and iOS devices: You may have used other similar VR notification forwarding software, but we are support iOS Device (iPhone Only) .

  • Android App : We also made an APP for Android, which will make using it faster and more convenient!

  • Long-term updates : NotificationCat VR has a long-term update plan We not only add new features during the software's lifecycle, but also respond to user feedback, including adopting new feature suggestions and fixing bugs!

  • Complete user manual and online developer support : Our user manual and error handling manual have both website and offline pdf versions, and You can ask for help from the developers via email, Steam or any other form

Having trouble using the Utility ?


If you have any issues with the application or find other compatibility issues, don't hesitate to contact us! We'll whip up a hotfix ASAP!

name: NotificationCat VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 1809 version
  • Processor: Any CPU that can play VR
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that can play VR
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card that can play VR
  • VR Support: Any VR that can Support SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: An Android phone running Android 8.0 or greater is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Any Version
  • Processor: Any CPU that can play VR
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that can play VR
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Sound Card that can play VR
  • VR Support: Any VR that can Support SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: An Android phone running Android 10 or greater is required

short_description: NotificationCat VR is a mobile phone message notification sync Utility allows you to forward notification messages from Android or iOS devices to VR Display notification messages such as notification titles, contents, etc. without taking off your VR headset.
